skillTree.localised_description: Blood everywhere and fatally wounds. There's no walking away from this.
Some warriors care not for their own personal safety, and so work themselves into a whirlwind of destruction and mindless violence!

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: Looking absolutely hideous is a distinct advantage if you actually want others to be afraid of you.
As a Bull Centaur ages, their flesh hardens like metal – harder to hurt, quicker to heal, and better at resisting magical attack.
The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.
Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your head…
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Who knows whether it's down to a sense of duty or fear of summary execution if he fails, but this one will resolutely guard the Temple of Hashut to the bitter, bloody end.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: None shall pass, at least not while this one breathes.
Learn from the very best if you wish to become better.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3
Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: The Taur'ruk knows that although this one probably works for his rivals as well, they are without doubt truly loyal to him.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors
Hero self-defence: +15% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.localised_description: All in the path of this murderous rampage will have little chance to react before being trampled into a fine red mist.
When that mist descends… Believe me, you don't want to be anywhere near this one, not if you value your worthless life!
When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In the harsh, cruel world of the Dawi-Zharr, throwing your weight around is definitely the way to get what you want.
"There are three ways of doing things around here: the right way, the wrong way, and the way that *I* do it. You understand?"
Even by Chaos Dwarf standards, this one has a short fuse, and is quick to anger when something – anything – doesn't happen quickly enough.
This one won't move, won't roll over, won't give a solitary inch to anyone, ever, over anything.
You never quite know where you are with this one. He'd kill you dead just as soon as look at you.

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with each kill made by the unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This one only ever sees red, which is unfortunate for… well, for just about anyone who gets in his way!
Some would call them hasty, others dynamic and valiant, for this one acts on impulse, before the enemy have a chance to react.
Kill them all and keep the loot for yourself. It's not a negative quality to be acquisitive as, after all, it's a material world, no?
No one likes him, but he really couldn't care less. He has an extremely thick skin, figuratively and literally, it seems.
Pride is supposed to come before a fall, but thus far, this one has not lived up to that proverb.
This one believes themselves to be better than others in every respect, and acts accordingly at every given opportunity.
Get in there, get bloody, get the job done – as soon as possible. Dallying's for losers.
It should be obvious that literally never being in a good mood is going to make one that little bit more brutal in melee.
Backhanders – hell, fronthanders, even, so unscrupulous is he.
"Do we have to? Urgh, how tedious…"
